StorageAccessCapability.description: Values of StorageAccessCapability describe abilities to read or write storage.

enumLongDescriptions.Append: This enumeration literal shall indicate that the storage may be written only to append.
enumLongDescriptions.Read: This enumeration literal shall indicate that the storage may be read.
enumLongDescriptions.Streaming: This enumeration literal shall indicate that the storage may be read sequentially.
enumLongDescriptions.Write: This enumeration literal shall indicate that the storage may be written multiple times.
enumLongDescriptions.WriteOnce: This enumeration literal shall indicate that the storage may be written only once.

StorageAccessCapability.longDescription: StorageAccessCapability enumeration literals may be used to describe abilities to read or write storage.

title: #StorageAccessCapability.v1_0_0
